name: Finding Her
tip: A nourished Pet can be returned to hand with Hold Tight, as long as you don’t put another card on top of it!

name: Keeping Her safe
tip: If you're nourished the round you play Oak it becomes extra effective.

name: Flowers for Her eyes
tip: If you remove enough cards from the game with Fleeting, drawing Pet every round becomes easy.

name: Empty without Her
tip: When Hollow sets your points to 0, it takes away the downside of negative Nourish.

name: Needing Her
tip: Exhale happens when the story resolves only if you have breath left over.

name: Becoming Her everything
tip: Can give you extra points on a round when you have carryover from Nourish or Inspire, so try not to go overkill.

name: Giving Her my all
tip: Can effectively give 5 points in a round if you use the Nourish and your opponent doesn’t.

name: My heart in Her hands
tip: Pomegranate coudld be the only Nourish you need for Pet.

name: Me and Her
tip: Me & Her can also double other types of carryover you play before it, like Nourish or a big Child
